title: Sustainable Nursing Simulation-Based Collaborative Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative simulation activities conducted in a smartphone-based microlearning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of sustainable nursing practice
Through collaborative simulations, learners can develop efficient medical resource utilization plans
Learners achieve 80% or higher on sustainability criteria in simulation assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
